pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Marrakesh Oil & Coconut Replenishing Oil Serum 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Extra Care MARRAKESH OIL & COCONUT Replenishing Oil Serum for normal to dry hair is formulated with AMINO ACID + ARGAN OIL FROM MOROCCO to deeply nourish and leave the hair feeling soft and supple.

Your normal to dry hair needs protection against everyday damage. It requires indulgent nourishment to keep it looking healthy.

EXTRA CARE MARRAKESH OIL & COCONUT offers:
+ HAIR NOURISHMENT WITH OIL INFUSED CAPSULES
+ SUPPLENESS WITHOUT OVERBURDENING HAIR
+ RENEWED HAIR STRUCTURE FOR SHINE & SOFTNESS

Bottle made from 100% recycled plastic. 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Suitable For: Normal to Dry Hair

Size: 100ml

Hair Type: Normal to Dry Hair

KEY FEATURES

• Softness & Suppleness
• Bottle made from 100% recycled plastic. 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details
• "EXTRA CARE formulas with LIQUID KERATIN, ADVANCED HAIR TECHNOLOGY & NATURAL ACTIVES help repair existing damage and provide protection with visibly improved hair quality."

Ingredients

Aqua · PEG-12 Dimethicone · PEG/PPG-17/6 Copolymer · PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil · Cyclomethicone · Glycerin · Phenoxyethanol · Polyquaternium-37 · Fragrance · Hydroxyethylcellulose · Agar · Polyquaternium-11 · Bisamino PEG/PPG-41/3 Aminoethyl PG-Propyl Dimethicone · Ethylhexylglycerin · Panthenol · Propylene Glycol · Lysine · Retinyl Palmitate · Arginine · Glycine · Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil · Serine · Mica · CI 77891 · CI 77491 · Panax Ginseng Root Extract · Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract · Citric Acid · Cocodimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin · Arctium Majus Root Extract · Acetyl Tyrosine · Hydrolyzed Soy Protein · Hydrolyzed Collagen · Hydrolyzed Keratin · Ornithine HCI · Niacinamide · Chlorphenesin · Citrulline · Methylparaben · Ethylparaben · Biotin

Directions

Use 1-2 pumps, rub palms together to activate the capsules and apply to mid-lengths and ends. USE ON: Dry or towel-dried hair. Leave in.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Bottle is Kerbside Recyclable

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 1 PET(E)
